//:>--------------------------------------------------------------------

//:<--------------------------------------------------------------------
int ami_load(amiBroker *broker)
{
   printf("*****************************************************\n");
   printf("*****************************************************\n");
   printf("*****                                           *****\n");
   printf("*****               WARNING !!!                 *****\n");
   printf("*****                                           *****\n");
   printf("*****  You are loading no analysis modules.     *****\n");
   printf("*****                                           *****\n");
   printf("*****************************************************\n");
   printf("*****************************************************\n");
   return TRUE;
}
